News.headline: Match Officials: Dagenham and Redbridge v Heybridge Swifts
News.page_title: Match Officials: Dagenham and Redbridge v Heybridge Swifts
News.URL_keywords: Match Officials: Dagenham and Redbridge v Heybridge Swifts
News.short_description: Tuesday's referee for the Daggers' Essex Senior Cup home fixture against Heybridge Swifts has been named as Anthony Pope.
News.description:
The two assistants have been named as Richard Carter and Karl Sear with the fourth official being Wayne Deller. 

Ticket information for the game can be found here.
